thread.title: WATCH: Pro-Trump Supporters Gather in NYC to Protest
thread.title_full: WATCH: Pro-Trump Supporters Gather in NYC to Protest

author: Kim Smith
title: WATCH: Pro-Trump Supporters Gather in NYC to Protest
text:
Schumer Protesters Go to His House to Yell, “What the F***, Chuck” 
Despite the left’s constant attempt to trash the president , the demonstrators said the president was doing a good job. 
In response to the president’s recent executive order temporarily banning immigration from seven majority-Muslim countries, one demonstrator named said, “What I believe is our country has a right to decide who comes in and who doesn’t come in, and I think the Congress and the president should decide that.” 
Dante Mazza and Arina Merkulova of Columbia Students for Trump also said the president was doing good things for the country so far.   
Take a look: 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 5, 2017 
WNYW reported that the crowd was a small one of about 100 people, but even if it had been 100,000 people, the anti-Trump liberal media would likely not have given it much attention. 
It seems as though most mainstream media outlets would rather the world believe that there are only a handful of Trump supporters, even though hordes of people waited in line to attend his rallies and even more showed up at the polls to vote for him on Election Day. 
The mainstream media also likely wouldn’t cover such an event because it wouldn’t promote their narrative that pro-Trump supporters are violent, aggressive people out to destroy this country and everything it stands for.
